name: Mungo Adventures
description:
Some time ago we had an idea – to make a video game. Zero experience, little skill and even less knowledge on the topic.

Now, after nearly a year*, we’re here. Slightly more experience, skill and knowledge, but still far from any kind of professionalism.

But we have the first fruit of our work: Mungo’s Adventures. By no means the game is top-notch finished, which we are perfectly aware of. But it works.

That’s why we want to share it with you.

Consider it as 15 minutes of entertainment for a chilled out evening.

If you have any thoughts about it, we will gladly hear them.

Positive and negative.

Ideas, remarks, comments.

All of them.

We are young and we are absorbing those things like a sponge.

On a serious note, download it and if you feel like sharing your thoughts with us we are waiting for you here, in comments or in a private message on Facebook.

Till the next one!

*nearly a year because the final exams jumped from around the corner and caused a little delay
